all_elements.parentText:
受款人編輯：必須輸入發票號碼(收據請按填入收據及填入日期)、受款人代碼(廠商統編或代墊者帳號)及受款人姓名。
同一計畫編號，同一個廠商，90天內，小額採購金額不得逾十五萬元。

all_elements.onblur: if(this.value!=''){if(isNaN(this.value)){alert('日期必須為6或7位數字,例:1150226');this.value='1150226'} if(this.value.length!=6 && this.value.length!=7){alert('日期必須為6或7位數字,例:1150226');this.value='1150226'}}

cells.html:
<form name="FORM1" id="FORM1" method="post">
	<input type="hidden" value="引用先前之請購案" onclick="location.reload();" class="BT06">		
	
	  <input type="button" value="借支現金" title="借支現金" onclick="FORM1.INVOICENO_1.value='已借支';FORM1.VENDORID_1.value=CharToAsc('XX04');FORM1.VENDORID_S_1.value='XX04';FORM1.VENNAME_1.value='借支現金';" class="BT04">
	  <input type="button" value="填入收據" title="自動填入收據" onclick="ATOREC();" class="BT04"><input type="button" value="詳如清冊" title="受款人資訊詳如清冊(適用於人事費等)" onclick="ATOLI
cells.text:
受款人編輯：必須輸入發票號碼(收據請按填入收據及填入日期)、受款人代碼(廠商統編或代墊者帳號)及受款人姓名。
同一計畫編號，同一個廠商，90天內，小額採購金額不得逾十五萬元。

cells.html:
<input type="checkbox" name="PROX_1" id="PROX_1" onclick="CP_1();">
								<input type="hidden" name="PAYKIND_1" id="PAYKIND_1" value="1" onblur="this.value=this.value.replace("'","");">
								<script language="javascript">
									
									function CP_1()
									{									   
										if (FORM1.PAYKIND_1.value=="2")
										{
											FORM1.PAYKIND_1.value="1";
											FORM1.PROX_1.checked=false;
										}
										else
										{
											FORM

<input type="text" name="INVOICENO_1" id="INVOICENO_1" onblur="QA_1();" value="" maxlength="10" class="STYINVOICENO">
								<script language="javascript">
									function QA_1()
									{
										FORM1.INVOICENO_1.value=FORM1.INVOICENO_1.value.toUpperCase();
										if(isNaN(FORM1.INVOICENO_1.value.substr(1,2))==false && FORM1.INVOICENO_1.value!="")
										{
											alert("發票號碼或收據前兩碼必須為文字!!");
											FORM1.INVOICENO_1.value="";
										}
									}
								</script>

<input type="text" name="IDATE_1" id="IDATE_1" onblur="if(this.value!=''){if(isNaN(this.value)){alert('日期必須為6或7位數字,例:1150226');this.value='1150226'} if(this.value.length!=6 && this.value.length!=7){alert('日期必須為6或7位數字,例:1150226');this.value='1150226'}}" value="" maxlength="7" class="STYIDATE">
查受款人

<input type="text" name="VENDORID_S_1" id="VENDORID_S_1" value="" onblur="CHK_P_1();" onchange="STAR_ID_1();" maxlength="10" class="STYVENDORID">
								<input type="hidden" name="VENDORID_1" id="VENDORID_1" value="">
                    			
                    	        <input type="hidden" name="BANKNO_1" id="BANKNO_1" value="" class="STYAMOUNT1">
                		        <input type="hidden" name="ACCOUNT_1" id="ACCOUNT_1" value="" class="STYAMOUNT1">
<input type="text" class="STYVENNAME" name="VENNAME_1" id="VENNAME_1" value="" maxlength="50" onblur="this.value=this.value.replace("'","吋").replace("#","號");">

<input type="text" name="AMOUNT_1" id="AMOUNT_1" maxlength="10" value="0" onclick="this.value="";" "="" onblur="if(isNaN(this.value)){alert('請輸入數字');this.value='0';} if(this.value==''){this.value='0';} SUM_SUM();" class="STYAMOUNT1">

<input type="checkbox" name="PROX_2" id="PROX_2" onclick="CP_2();">
								<input type="hidden" name="PAYKIND_2" id="PAYKIND_2" value="1" onblur="this.value=this.value.replace("'","");">
								<script language="javascript">
									
									function CP_2()
									{									   
										if (FORM1.PAYKIND_2.value=="2")
										{
											FORM1.PAYKIND_2.value="1";
											FORM1.PROX_2.checked=false;
										}
										else
										{
											FORM

<input type="text" name="INVOICENO_2" id="INVOICENO_2" onblur="QA_2();" value="" maxlength="10" class="STYINVOICENO">
								<script language="javascript">
									function QA_2()
									{
										FORM1.INVOICENO_2.value=FORM1.INVOICENO_2.value.toUpperCase();
										if(isNaN(FORM1.INVOICENO_2.value.substr(1,2))==false && FORM1.INVOICENO_2.value!="")
										{
											alert("發票號碼或收據前兩碼必須為文字!!");
											FORM1.INVOICENO_2.value="";
										}
									}
								</script>

<input type="text" name="IDATE_2" id="IDATE_2" onblur="if(this.value!=''){if(isNaN(this.value)){alert('日期必須為6或7位數字,例:1150226');this.value='1150226'} if(this.value.length!=6 && this.value.length!=7){alert('日期必須為6或7位數字,例:1150226');this.value='1150226'}}" value="" maxlength="7" class="STYIDATE">
查受款人

<input type="text" name="VENDORID_S_2" id="VENDORID_S_2" value="" onblur="CHK_P_2();" onchange="STAR_ID_2();" maxlength="10" class="STYVENDORID">
								<input type="hidden" name="VENDORID_2" id="VENDORID_2" value="">
                    			
                    	        <input type="hidden" name="BANKNO_2" id="BANKNO_2" value="" class="STYAMOUNT1">
                		        <input type="hidden" name="ACCOUNT_2" id="ACCOUNT_2" value="" class="STYAMOUNT1">
<input type="text" class="STYVENNAME" name="VENNAME_2" id="VENNAME_2" value="" maxlength="50" onblur="this.value=this.value.replace("'","吋").replace("#","號");">

<input type="text" name="AMOUNT_2" id="AMOUNT_2" maxlength="10" value="0" onclick="this.value="";" "="" onblur="if(isNaN(this.value)){alert('請輸入數字');this.value='0';} if(this.value==''){this.value='0';} SUM_SUM();" class="STYAMOUNT1">
